reviews.text: Chestnut brown with full bodied foam. Spices - cinnamon, liquorice, malt, bread, caramel, almonds, dried figs.
Nice Beer made With a Nice rounded taste of caramel, spice and liquorice. Reminiscent of many brown ales. The hot stone method is interesting however not producing any particular taste in my opinion.
Rich tasting ale with notes of caramel, malt, biscuit, hoppy aroma - flowers, fresh green fruit. Well balanced bitterness and smooth CO2. Pleasant glass. 50 cl can.
